text: geudeul-eun junim-iyeo jeohuiui yeo haeng-i meoldolog hayeo jusoseo lago mal hani seuseuloleul ulonghadeola geuliha yeo ulineun geudeul-eul hwaje-ui yaegilo mandeul-eo geudeul-eul sansanhi heut-eojidolog hayeoss-euni sillo geu an-eneun innaeha go gamsahaneun modeun ideul-eul wihan ye jeung-i issnola
